stories.Title: Wear the future
stories.Description: We're finally getting answers about what Humane's AI Pin has in store for us. Positioned as a standalone device, this wearable has it all—from voice-based interaction to gesture controls.
stories.Tweet: Wear the future 📦 We're finally getting answers about what Humane's AI Pin has in store for us. Positioned as a standalone device, this wearable has it all—from voice-based interaction to gesture controls. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/8/23953022/humane-ai-pin-price-specs-leak

stories.Title: Leave it to Eos
stories.Description: Training a 175 billion-parameter GPT-3 model in under four minutes seemed impossible not long ago, but NVIDIA's Eos supercomputer, with over 10,000 H100 Tensor Core GPUs, sets new standards.
stories.Tweet: Leave it to Eos 📦 Training a 175 billion-parameter GPT-3 model in under four minutes seemed impossible not long ago, but NVIDIA's Eos supercomputer, with over 10,000 H100 Tensor Core GPUs, sets new standards. #ai https://www.engadget.com/nvidias-eos-supercomputer-just-broke-its-own-ai-training-benchmark-record-170042546.html

stories.Title: Just for business
stories.Description: GitHub's Copilot Enterprise is a premium offering poised to transform how developers work. With a focus on internal source code, this upgraded assistant aims to boost productivity for companies.
stories.Tweet: Just for business 📦 GitHub's Copilot Enterprise is a premium offering poised to transform how developers work. With a focus on internal source code, this upgraded assistant aims to boost productivity for companies. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/08/microsoft-launches-github-copilot-enterprise-to-help-with-private-code.html

stories.Title: Real talk in all languages
stories.Description: Samsung's AI commitment continues as they gear up for a tech revolution with "Galaxy AI," highlighting an upcoming feature with real-time translations during phone calls.
stories.Tweet: Real talk in all languages 📦 Samsung's AI commitment continues as they gear up for a tech revolution with "Galaxy AI," highlighting an upcoming feature with real-time translations during phone calls. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/8/23953198/samsung-galaxy-ai-live-translate-call

stories.Title: A new way to search
stories.Description: Google has just expanded the reach of its Search Generative Experience. Accessible in 120 countries, users can now enjoy additional languages and improved features.
stories.Tweet: A new way to search 📦 Google has just expanded the reach of its Search Generative Experience. Accessible in 120 countries, users can now enjoy additional languages and improved features. #google https://www.engadget.com/googles-ai-powered-search-feature-goes-global-with-a-120-country-expansion-180028037.html

stories.Title: A huggy approach
stories.Description: Hugging Face is determined to shape the future of AI chatbots. The startup's H4 team, born in the wake of ChatGPT's release, focuses on alignment research and the development of open-source models.
stories.Tweet: A huggy approach 📦 Hugging Face is determined to shape the future of AI chatbots. The startup's H4 team, born in the wake of ChatGPT's release, focuses on alignment research and the development of open-source models. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/08/hugging-face-has-a-two-person-team-developing-chatgpt-like-ai-models/

stories.Title: The path to greener skies
stories.Description: Eco-friendly air travel is a key goal for LTA Research. That's why they're launching Pathfinder 1, an electric airship prototype for disaster relief and zero-carbon passenger transportation.
stories.Tweet: The path to greener skies 📦 Eco-friendly air travel is a key goal for LTA Research. That's why they're launching Pathfinder 1, an electric airship prototype for disaster relief and zero-carbon passenger transportation. #startups https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/08/the-worlds-largest-aircraft-breaks-cover-in-silicon-valley/

stories.Title: Time to pause
stories.Description: After a few trips into suborbital space, Virgin Galactic is taking some time off. The company is shifting to a quarterly schedule to focus on resource redirection and the development of new vehicles.
stories.Tweet: Time to pause 📦 After a few trips into suborbital space, Virgin Galactic is taking some time off. The company is shifting to a quarterly schedule to focus on resource redirection and the development of new vehicles. #space https://spacenews.com/virgin-galactic-to-halt-unity-suborbital-flights-by-mid-2024/

stories.Title: A distant twin
stories.Description: By using NASA's Webb Telescope, scientists have recently discovered ceers-2112, a distant spiral galaxy that mimics the Milky Way's structure but dates back to the early days of the Universe.
stories.Tweet: A distant twin 📦 By using NASA's Webb Telescope, scientists have recently discovered ceers-2112, a distant spiral galaxy that mimics the Milky Way's structure but dates back to the early days of the Universe. #space https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/nasas-space-telescope-spots-a-milky-way-twin-from-the-early-universe

stories.Title: Ready, Tesla fans?
stories.Description: Cybertruck's delivery event is just around the corner, and new insights are surfacing just in time to boost anticipation. Check out the leaked specs for a preview of what's about to hit the streets!
stories.Tweet: Ready, Tesla fans? 📦 Cybertruck's delivery event is just around the corner, and new insights are surfacing just in time to boost anticipation. Check out the leaked specs for a preview of what's about to hit the streets! #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/11/08/tesla-cybertruck-specs-leak-14-50-outlet-in-bed/

title: Humane's AI Pin revealed, Samsung's AI for calls, Countdown to Cybertruck
description: The coolest wearable ever is about to drop, and we've got all the details—from the price tag to how it works and even the stylish ways to rock it. I've been telling you: Samsung's not playing around with AI. The upcoming "Galaxy AI" is going to spice up their smartphone game, including real-time call translations. And yes, we're counting down the days to the Cybertruck reveal, but lucky for us, leaks spilled the specs! Check it out!
